title: Event
description: An action that occurs at some location during some time.

verbatimEventDate.description: The verbatim original representation of the date and time information for an Event.

habitat.description: A category or description of the habitat in which the Event occurred.

samplingProtocol.description: The name of, reference to, or description of the method or protocol used during an Event.

eventName.description: The name commonly used to identify or refer to the event.

hasPersonRole.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the PersonRole class.

hasIdentifier.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

hasReference.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

hasTemporalCoverage.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the TemporalCoverage class.

hasMeasurementOrFact.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.
